reviewText: When something is featured I usually think that means there are other items that are not featured as in "...and now for our FEATURE PRESENTATION". Here, the only items on this video are the features. Surprisingly, it was under a half hour of video. It sure would be nice if somewhere out there in media-land this little mouse really did get featured. A DVD of a collection of Mighty Mouse cartoons would be great. I'm having a hard time finding any media that has more than 1 amongst a collection of other cartoons, even those that have MM as their "cover mouse".
